page.title: 15Playground Games,Liskeard
page.content: "My favourite game is Sticky Toffee because in it you have to run very fast and I like running fast.You have to have a person who is 'it'.He runs around and if he touches you,you have to freeze.You stay like that until someone else touches you and then you can move again.If 'it' touches all of the people playing he wins."{ { }Tim,aged 7 { {Offground |************** {Bulldog |************************** {44 in |****************** {Wild tig |********** {Red letter|***** } {Sticky T |****** }Junior School {Chain tig |*** }Playground games, {Wall ball |******* }1985 {Ice-cream |*** {Polo |******* 0____10___20___30___40___50_
